mathematica: Accumulate[RecurrenceTable[{a[0]==1,a[1]==7,a[n]==a[n-1]+a[n-2]+(n+2) Binomial[n+3,3]/2},a,{n,30}]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Sep 22 2013 *)CoefficientList[Series[-(x + 1)/((x - 1)^6 (x^2 + x - 1)), {x, 0, 40}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 23 2013 *)
